p4a.ploneaudio
==============

Overview
--------

The *p4a.ploneimage* package is an integration component for integrating
the *p4a.image* framework onto the Plone platform.  It was inspired by 
the Plone ATPhoto product and its sibling p4a content types.

Maintainer
----------

David Siedband (technique at oceanicsky dot com) is the active maintainer of the
*p4a.ploneimage* component.
